department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: green and brown ground; numerous figures and animals:  horses tied to a bar in ULC with figures smoking pipes and a wagon; three figures with oxen in URC; two oxen pulling carts at right center; blue, white, red and brown tent at bottom center; man with goat to left of tent; two men carrying vessels on a pole in LLC; man and woman to left of tent; inscriptions in black and red, ULC; unmounted--brown painted border
title: Untitled
